name: Vortex Mod Manager
content:
files:
- setup: https://github.com/Nexus-Mods/Vortex/releases/download/v0.18.6/vortex-setup-0.18.6.exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Black Tree Gaming Ltd/Vortex/Vortex.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet46 win10
    description: Installing dotnet46
    name: winetricks
- task:
    args: /S
    exclude_processes: Vortex.exe
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
